title: Diamond and Emerald Grand Haaram - Shobha Rani Collection
materials: Natural Emeralds (Round Cut). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a contemporary design with traditional South Indian elements. It features a graduated collar of brilliant-cut diamonds, accented by delicate gold beading. The central pendant, a masterpiece of intricate filigree work, houses a vibrant emerald surrounded by a halo of shimmering diamonds. Dainty diamond-studded drops add movement and sparkle. The "V" shape adds a modern touch to the traditional Indian necklace.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham or half-saree functions (Langa Voni). Also suitable for making a statement at high-end parties.
description: This Haaram is a harmonious blend of traditional artistry and modern design. The brilliant-cut diamonds and natural emeralds are carefully selected for their exceptional quality. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lasting shine. It represents a timeless investment and a treasured heirloom, radiating both elegance and cultural significance. The quality and artistry of this piece are truly unmatched.
